mapper.select:
select id, url as routePath, `name` as menuName, component, parent_id as parentMenu, `type`, sort_order as orderNo, icon, permision_code as permission, status, is_external_link as isExt, is_cache as keepalive, is_display as `show`, FROM_UNIXTIME(created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") as createTime from sys_permission where status != 2
AND name like '%${menuName}%'
AND status = #{status}
order by sort_order asc
